subject: RE: [junit] Re: Get AssertionFailedError when assert from another thread.
msgSnippet: Isn t the problem that you re getting an Error and not an Exception? Assertions which fail cause the program to terminate - as expected.  JUnit won t have an
messageBody:
Isn't the problem that you're getting an Error and not
an Exception?

Assertions which fail cause the program to terminate -
as expected. JUnit won't have an opportunity to catch
this.

There was a rather lengthy discussion about Assertions
and JUnit in the extremeprogramming group and about
how to test Assertions, or whether Assertions are unit
tests that should be written in JUnit.

Sorry if this has already been posted.

As for catching the Error within JUnit, I'm not sure
how you would do this, or if you would want to.

Cheers,

Tom
